results.description: Scottish League Two club Queen's Park will decide whether to end their 152-year-old amateur club status on Thursday.

results.description: BBC Scotland speaks to Preston North End manager Alex Neil on success, dedication and the future of Scottish coaches in England.
results.title: Alex Neil: Preston manager on his will to work and win

results.description: Seven goals, two red cards, a penalty and suspicion of an own goal keep the crowd entertained as Annan Athletic hammer bottom side Brechin City in Scottish League Two.
results.title: Annan Athletic 5-2 Brechin City: Seven goals, two red cards, a penalty and maybe an own goal

results.description: Northern Ireland manager Michael O'Neill thinks media criticism of Austin MacPhee is unfair and backs his former assistant to be Tynecastle director of football.

results.description: Rangers' Ryan Jack says the city rivalry with Celtic is always put aside in the Scotland camp as Raheem Sterling is dropped by England for a bust-up with team-mate Joe Gomez.
results.title: Scotland: Celtic-Rangers rivalries put aside as 'we are a team' - Ryan Jack

results.description: Police Scotland investigates fan misbehaviour, including spitting at a match official, at Saturday's Scottish Championship game between Queen of the South and Ayr United.
results.title: Police Scotland investigates Ayr United fans after spitting at match official

results.description: Scotland assistant Alex Dyer says captain Andy Robertson, Scott McTominay and Ryan Fraser pulled out of Euro 2020 qualifiers against Cyprus and Kazakhstan with "genuine" injuries.
results.title: Scotland: Andy Robertson, Ryan Fraser and Scott McTominay 'genuinely injured' - Alex Dyer

results.description: Former Scotland forward Kevin Gallacher says players must "step up" their efforts to end the nation's 22-year wait for a major tournament.
results.title: Scotland players are not taking international duty seriously - Kevin Gallacher

results.description: Austin MacPhee "has to be considered" for the Hearts manager's job, says former Tynecastle player Gary Mackay.

results.description: Hamilton were held to a 2-2 draw by 10-men Kilmarnock but one positive to come from the game was this incredible long-range goal from forward Mickel Miller.

results.description: Hearts comfortably overcame St Mirren 5-2 on Saturday, with the second goal coming from an unfortunate own goal by Sean McLoughlin in the first half.

results.description: Scotland's defensive options are diminished further as Leeds United centre-half Liam Cooper pulls out of the squad through injury.
